text:
MICHIGAN STATE UNIVERSITY
OF AGRICULTURE AND APPLIED SCIENCE • EAST LANSING
TELEVISION STATION • WKAR-TV
March 5, 1957
Mr, Harry J, Skornia
Executive Director, NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Enclosed is my review of "Closed Circuit Television In Engineering Education,"
I am still holding myself in readiness to review the Halifax Study of the CBC,
One of their new employees was in my office Friday, which coincidence prompts
me to inquire of you, if the CBC ever forwarded copies of their report and
permission to review.
See you at Columbus.
Sincerely,
Irving R, Merrill
Director of Television Research
IRMtlam
Enclosures
